title: Messenger Pro is an Xposed Module that adds loads of features to Facebook Messenger
content:
Meta’s Messenger is one of the most popular instant messaging apps in the world, riding on the sheer popularity of Facebook. The Messenger app does a lot of things right for it to gain this popularity, but it also has a few limitations that are intentionally placed. For example, the inability to use text formatting

The post Messenger Pro is an Xposed Module that adds loads of features to Facebook Messenger appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Messenger Pro by XDA Member Mino260806 is an Xposed Module that extends and adds features to the official Facebook Messenger app. Read on!
